name: Death Is A New Beginning (Scott Topping)
name_original: Death Is A New Beginning (Scott Topping)
description:
Game made for kindred community jam 2.

Theme of the Jam was 'death is a new beginning'

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse - melee attack

Right Mouse - Shoot

R - reload

Credits

Programming and Development - Scott Topping

Pixel Art - Luke Winkley 

Music
